github.copilot.chat.commitMessageGenerat.text:
please Always format commit messages as '<emoji> <type>: <message>'. Use this exact mapping:
- ✨ feat: for new features
- 🐛 fix: for bug fixes
- 🩹 chore: for config or small tasks
- 📝 docs: for documentation
- 🎨 style: for formatting or CSS changes
- ♻️ refactor: for code refactor
- ✅ test: for adding/updating tests
Never generate messages without the emoji at the beginning.
